title: Be Careful before using it
reviews:
I rated 5-star before. Because i saw that they replied and processed my orders so fast and be cheaper than aliexpress. But actually, it was not at all after one month i used it.

1. The shipping cost is so high, the packet service is the cheapest shipping method but it takes over 40 days to deliver to the UK. Compared to Aliexpress, it only takes 12 days with the same shipping service.
2. Product cost, because it is sourced from factors. So the product cost is cheaper than other platforms. But if you compare total product cost + Shipping cost (delivery during 12 days as using the epacket service on aliexpress) on CJ dropshipping with other platforms. It is much expensive (nearly double).
3. Refund and return
This platform will process refunds and return for you. Not use third-party as other platforms. So it is not fair. You have to face one problem that it is difficult to take money back.

After one month of using it, I think you should consider carefully before using or you just test some orders before place a big quantity
( I place many orders on this platform and really regret, now i have to solve many problems from my customers because of using it)

title: Stay away from these guys
reviews:
We were excited to discover CJ dropshipping - a dropshipping platform from China. On paper it looks great. You read through how they operate and all they promise and you think - this has real potential!

They claim they can source anything within a few days, they claim they have very quick processing and delivery times, you will be given your own personal agent to support you at any time... and so much more! Sounds awesome, right? Unfortunately this is where the positivity ends, as the CJ dropshipping described above only exists as a seed of optimism planted in your mind by CJ's clever marketing.

Now let's talk about the reality:

1. Their platform/system:

You can expect to be baffled by their platform and frustrated constantly by the bugs and errors encountered when using it.

2. Their sourcing:

When you post a sourcing request you have to provide the URL to the product on aliexperess/alibaba. They claim they can source any product witihn a few days. The reality is it took weeks to get a result each time, and many end up as 'sourcing fail'. We were baffled when we had requested them to source a number of products from the same supplier, some of which came back as 'sourcing success' and some as 'sourcing fail' - the reason for the 'sourcing fail' you ask? "Cannot find the supplier'! So one product can be sourced and the supplier found... but another cannot because the supplier can't be found... when it's the exact same supplier. Riiiight! Also, often when you can get a product sourced which has a number of variables (colour, size etc) CJ Dropshipping cannot be bothered to offer them all on their platform and will randomly choose a few colours or perhaps one size. Great, so now I can only sell this T-shirt in blue and size XS, even though the supplier can make it a range of colours and sizes. Cheers for that!

3. Their processing/shipping time:

CJ claims fast processing times of a few days or quicker. They have a number of fast shipping options. Or so it seems. Not a single one of our orders arrived to the customer on time. At best the order was 4 days late, and at worst over a month late.

CJ has a number of tricks with shipping that attempt to pull the wool over your eyes. Let's say you cough up and pay for a faster shipping option like USPS, which CJ clearly states will take 4 - 8 days. Yes, USPS will deliver it within 4 - 8 days within the US, once they have actually received the package. Often it takes CJ 1-2 weeks to process the order and then another 2 weeks to ship it to the US. So after 3 or 4 weeks, USPS will receive it and deliver it within the 4-8 day time frame.

Trick number 1: They keep it a secret when they actually ship your order (this is so you don't know how long it took them to process it and so they can blame the courier company)

Trick number 2: They will create a 'pre-shipment label' with USPS or the courier which makes you think they are getting it ready. Sometimes CJ takes so long to process the order and ship it from China that this pre-shipment label expires and they have to create a new one, and your customer will have a different tracking order from the one that was first sent to them.

Trick number 3: They sometimes keep your order for a long time so they can combine it with other orders from other sellers that are going to the same place, so they can save money on shipping for their own profit. You will not receive any discount of course!

Your agent/ CJ dropshipping customer service:

This was the worst part for us. Even though you are given an agent and they have a instant customer support chat box on the website, you quickly realise that all this is futile. Why? Because Cj are not interested in helping you or resolving issues or even providing relevant information -> they will consistently make excuses and lie to you! I would forgive them for the slow shipping and other problems if they were at least honest, but I cannot forgive someone who consistently lies to me! Avoid!

title: Stay Away From CJdropshipping
reviews:
At one time, I was extremely interested in doing business with CJdropshipping. The pictures of their products look like they could be good quality and unique. But that's where my praise ends.

I decided to give them a try. Sooo, I started researching their products for the fashion niche. What I found was not acceptable. Virtually every single product that I checked out had no product information. I can understand them wanting to save money and time by not adding a description of their products... However, they do not add basic facts for their products. This happened for 90-95% of the products I was interested in. Having a professional online store, my customers expect at the very least... to know what the sizes are and what the product is made of. But nope, CJdropshippng didn't even add that critical information.

When I reached out to customer support and asked for the information, all they had to say was that "their supplier doesn't provide that information". What professional business sells a product and has absolutely no information about it? Also, many of their products don't have size charts and only one picture of the product. What business have you ever seen that offered only one picture of any particular product? Hey, maybe you've seen some, but ask yourself one question: did you end up buying that product? I suspect the answer is "no" with just about everyone that reads this review.

Sufficed to say, CJdropshipping is not a good platform to use with your dropshipping business. Of course, it's entirely your decision to use them. Remember though, I warned you.
